items.title: 苹果2025年产品路线图：即将推出的产品 (原标题: Apple's 2025 Product Roadmap: What's Still Coming)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果2025年产品路线图：即将推出的产品

尽管苹果的两大年度盛事——WWDC和iPhone发布会已经结束，但预计在2025年底前，仍有多款新产品将面世。

![Apple 2025 Thumb 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/3gVsbbtvgBtxL75r4O0m_7aHTUI=/400x0/article-new/2024/12/Apple-2025-Thumb-1.jpg?lossy)

### Apple TV

自2022年以来未曾更新的Apple TV有望在2025年迎来刷新。预计其设计不会改变，但内部将有显著升级：

*   **芯片升级**：将搭载A17 Pro芯片，该芯片首次应用于iPhone 15 Pro机型，并已在iPad mini 7中使用。
    *   **Apple Intelligence支持**：A17 Pro支持Apple Intelligence，有望为Apple TV带来改进的搜索和内容推荐功能。
    *   **游戏性能提升**：A17 Pro更先进的GPU具备硬件加速光线追踪能力，可能使Apple TV支持更高质量的主机级游戏。
*   **网络芯片**：将采用苹果设计的N1蓝牙和Wi-Fi芯片，该芯片已在新款iPhone中应用。
*   **Siri集成**：尽管全新Siri版本要到2026年春季才推出，但未来的Apple TV可能会在某个时候集成新版Siri。
*   **价格策略**：苹果可能会降低Apple TV的价格，或以更实惠的价格销售旧型号，以更好地与亚马逊Fire Stick等产品竞争。

![Apple TV 2025 Thumb 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kou4oQMXYLNfbkRRQ6MlUwAtt9E=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/Apple-TV-2025-Thumb-2.jpg?lossy)

### M5 iPad Pro

苹果正在开发搭载全新M5芯片的iPad Pro更新版，其信息已通过本周早些时候的开箱视频泄露：

*   **型号与设计**：预计将推出11英寸和13英寸版本，设计与当前的M4 iPad Pro型号相同。
*   **性能提升**：根据基准测试，M5芯片的多核CPU性能比M4芯片快12%，GPU性能快36%。
*   **内存与摄像头**：与iPhone Air和iPhone 17 Pro型号一样，下一代iPad Pro将配备12GB RAM（高于8GB）。有传言称将配备第二个前置摄像头，以支持纵向和横向视频通话，尽管视频中未显示，但并非不可能。

![ipad pro prime day 2025](https://images.macrumors.com/t/thjctzWOGyHRMnV88E231KBNGik=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ipad-pro-prime-day-2025.jpeg?lossy)

### 更新版 Vision Pro

苹果还将在更新版Vision Pro中使用M5芯片，取代现有的M2芯片：

*   **核心升级**：此次更新将主要集中在芯片上，没有计划进行设计更改。
*   **舒适度改进**：苹果可能会推出更舒适的头带，以减轻颈部疲劳和头部不适。
*   **发布时间**：FCC意外泄露了下一代Vision Pro及其他设备，表明新型号即将推出，预计在2025年某个时候发布。

![Apple Vision Pro Dual Loop Band Teal Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/cGS2dSNj6awvzKezm4ny-rTg0es=/400x0/article-new/2024/01/Apple-Vision-Pro-Dual-Loop-Band-Teal-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)

### HomePod mini

自2020年发布以来未曾更新的HomePod mini，预计将在2025年迎来刷新：

*   **芯片升级**：下一代HomePod mini将搭载更新的S系列芯片，很可能是Apple Watch Series 11中的S10芯片。
    *   **性能与音频**：S10芯片将提供更快的性能，改进计算音频的实时调优，并可能支持更多的设备端Siri处理。
    *   **新功能潜力**：更近期的Apple Watch芯片（如S9及更高版本）具有高度计和四核神经网络引擎，可能为HomePod mini带来定位、音频定向等新功能。
*   **网络与外观**：与更新的Apple TV一样，新款HomePod mini预计将使用苹果的N1网络芯片，支持蓝牙和Wi-Fi，并支持连接6GHz网络。此外，预计还将推出新的颜色选项。

![homepod mini color bars](https://images.macrumors.com/t/v6Vjgm-UoF2hhIDNQ8xSEO1X_Wo=/400x0/article-new/2021/11/homepod-mini-color-bars.jpg?lossy)

### AirTag 2

AirTag 2预计也将在2025年底前更新，但没有重大的设计变化：

*   **内部改进**：形状预计不变，但内部将进行改进。
*   **追踪能力**：将采用第二代超宽带芯片，追踪范围扩大三倍。扬声器将更难被取出，以防止在没有声音警报的情况下进行隐藏追踪。
*   **未实现功能**：不提供可充电电池或纤薄的钱包版本设计。

![airtag blue 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ew3mcOF1wqzL0mHXMYfln3280Pc=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/airtag-blue-2.jpeg?lossy)

### MacBook Pro

FCC的泄露信息中包含了一款MacBook Pro，但没有多个型号，这表明整个MacBook Pro产品线的全面更新可能不会很快到来：

*   **M5芯片型号**：苹果可能推出搭载M5芯片的低成本MacBook Pro，而M5 Pro和M5 Max版本则稍后发布，这符合苹果分批发布的先例。考虑到iPad Pro和Vision Pro等M5设备预计在2025年首次亮相，M5 MacBook Pro在同年推出也合情合理。
*   **发布时间线**：M5/M5 Pro/M5 Max MacBook Pro型号的发布时间传闻不一，从2025年末到2026年初都有可能。如果苹果等到2026年初才发布大部分MacBook Pro型号，可能会与计划于2026年末（或可能推迟到2027年）发布的OLED版MacBook Pro造成混淆。因此，苹果可能希望在2025年推出所有M5型号。

![macbook pro pink](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Hx4TuUbk1KawkfZ2oLcsJgu6djw=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/macbook-pro-pink.jpeg?lossy)

### 十月发布会展望

苹果在9月发布会后有时会在10月或11月举行第二次秋季发布会。今年有这种可能性，但并非板上钉钉：

*   **发布形式**：由于2025年最后几个月传闻中的产品更新多为内部升级，缺乏重大亮点，苹果可能通过新闻稿发布新设备。
*   **M5芯片发布**：苹果喜欢在发布会上揭示新版本的Apple芯片，而M5芯片尚未亮相。如果举行发布会，可能会在10月底宣布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果预计2025年底前推出多款新品。Apple TV将升级A17 Pro芯片，支持Apple Intelligence和游戏。iPad Pro与Vision Pro均搭载M5芯片，性能显著提升。HomePod mini更新S10芯片，增强智能处理。AirTag 2改进超宽带芯片，扩大追踪范围。MacBook Pro或推出M5版本。新品可能通过新闻稿发布。

items.content:
Apple's two big yearly events, WWDC and the iPhone launch, are done and over with, but there are still some new products that we're expecting to see before the end of the year.


Apple TV


The Apple TV hasn't been updated since 2022, so it's due for a refresh. It doesn't look like Apple is going to change the design of its set-top box, but we can expect a faster chip


Apple code suggests that the upcoming ‌Apple TV‌ will use the A17 Pro chip, which Apple first debuted in the ‌iPhone‌ 15 Pro models. The A17 Pro is in the iPad mini 7, and it supports Apple Intelligence. We could see some new ‌Apple Intelligence‌ features for the ‌Apple TV‌ for improving search and content recommendations.

There's a new version of Siri that will likely be integrated into the ‌Apple TV‌ at some point, but the revamped version of ‌Siri‌ isn't coming until spring 2026 and we're expecting the ‌Apple TV‌ before the end of 2025.

The A17 Pro has more advanced GPU capabilities like hardware-accelerated ray tracing for console-quality games, so we could see the ‌Apple TV‌ able to support higher-quality gaming titles.

Rumors suggest the ‌Apple TV‌ will get an Apple-designed Bluetooth and Wi-Fi chip, and we now know that the chip is called the N1. It's already in the new ‌iPhone‌ models, so it makes sense for Apple to incorporate it in other devices coming this year.

Apple could potentially lower the price of the ‌Apple TV‌ or sell an older model at a more affordable price to better compete with products like the Amazon Fire Stick that provides 4K streaming for less than $50.

M5 iPad Pro


Apple is working on an updated iPad Pro with a new M5 chip, and we already know quite a bit about it since it leaked in an unboxing video earlier this week.


We're expecting 11-inch and 13-inch versions of the ‌iPad Pro‌, with the same design as the current M4 ‌iPad Pro‌ models. Based on benchmarks, the M5 offers up to 12 percent faster multi-core CPU performance compared to the M4 chip, and up to 36 percent faster GPU performance. Like the iPhone Air and the iPhone 17 Pro models, the next ‌iPad Pro‌ will have 12GB RAM, up from 8GB.

Rumors have suggested the next-generation ‌iPad Pro‌ will have a second front camera so that it can be used for video calls in portrait and landscape orientations. A second front camera is not visible in the video, but it's not out of the question.

Updated Vision Pro


Apple is also going to use the M5 chip in an updated version of the Vision Pro, replacing the M2 chip. So far, it sounds like the Vision Pro refresh will focus solely on the chip, with no design changes planned.


While the headset isn't being updated, Apple might introduce a more comfortable head strap to reduce neck strain and head pain.

The FCC accidentally leaked the next Vision Pro and several other devices earlier this week, so we know a new model isn't too far off. Rumors have said that the revamped Vision Pro will launch sometime in 2025.

HomePod mini


The HomePod mini hasn't been updated since it came out in 2020, but 2025 will supposedly be the year that it gets a refresh.


It looks like the next ‌HomePod mini‌ will get an updated S-series chip, likely the same S10 chip that's in the Apple Watch Series 11. The original ‌HomePod mini‌ has the S5 chip that was used in the Apple Watch Series 5, but Apple did make some HomePod-specific tweaks to it, like including Ultra Wideband capabilities.

The S10 chip will provide faster performance for any underlying processing that the ‌HomePod mini‌ does. The ‌HomePod mini‌ uses computational audio for real-time tuning, so that will see an improvement, and it could support more on-device ‌Siri‌ processing.

More recent Apple Watch chips have an altimeter that could come in handy for positioning and audio orienting on a ‌HomePod mini‌, and the S9 and later chips have a four-core Neural Engine that might also add new functionality.

Like the updated ‌Apple TV‌, the new ‌HomePod mini‌ is expected to use Apple's N1 networking chip for Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, with support for connecting to 6GHz networks.

Along with these internal changes, we're also expecting new color options for the ‌HomePod mini‌.

AirTag 2


The AirTag 2 is yet another product that's supposed to be updated before the end of 2025, but with no major design changes. Rumors suggest the shape of the ‌AirTag‌ isn't going to change, but Apple will make under-the-hood improvements.


It will be harder to get the speaker out of the ‌AirTag‌ 2, preventing tampering for hidden tracking without sound alerts. AirTags could also be trackable from further distances, with Apple adding a second-generation Ultra Wideband chip that supports three times the range.

Unfortunately, it doesn't look like the AirTags are going to get a rechargeable battery or design options like a slim wallet version.

MacBook Pro


The FCC's leak included a MacBook Pro, but there weren't multiple variants in the database like we would expect if a refresh of the entire ‌MacBook Pro‌ line was coming soon.


It's possible that Apple will announce a lower-cost ‌MacBook Pro‌ that has an M5 chip, saving M5 Pro and M5 Max variants for a later date. There is precedent for that kind of staggered launch, and it would make sense because other M5 devices like the ‌iPad Pro‌ and Vision Pro are rumored to be debuting in 2025.

Rumors about the launch timing of the M5/M5 Pro/M5 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌ models have changed throughout the year. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman first said the ‌MacBook Pro‌ models would be refreshed in late 2025, before saying Apple was "internally targeting" an early 2026 launch. Last weekend, Gurman claimed that the new ‌MacBook Pro‌ models would come out sometime between late 2025 and early 2026, so the timeline isn't clear.

If Apple does wait until early 2026 to unveil all or most of the ‌MacBook Pro‌ models, it might make for a confusing year. Apple is developing an OLED version of the ‌MacBook Pro‌ that's supposed to come out in late 2026, so there would be an early 2026 launch and perhaps a late 2026 launch if the OLED technology isn't later delayed until 2027.

Since there is a major 2026 refresh in play, Apple might want to get all of the M5 models out in 2025.

Will There Be an October Event?


After its September event, Apple sometimes holds a second fall event in October or November. This year, a new event is a possibility, but it's not guaranteed.

Most of the product refreshes that are rumored for the last few months of 2025 will feature internal updates with no major flashy additions. For that reason, Apple could announce new devices through press releases. Apple's last October event was in 2023, when it shared a short "Scary Fast" Mac-focused presentation. In 2024, Apple released new M4 Mac models with press releases, so it could go either way.

Apple does like to unveil new versions of the Apple silicon chip at events, and we haven't seen the M5 yet. The M1 came out at an November 2020 event, the ‌M2‌ was unveiled at WWDC, the M3 came out in an October 2023 event, and the M4 was introduced at a May 2024 event.

For the last two years, Apple's October announcements have come toward the end of the month, so if there is an event, we could hear about it in the next couple of weeks.
This article, "Apple's 2025 Product Roadmap: What's Still Coming" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 苹果暂停开发轻量版Vision Pro，加速AI智能眼镜项目 (原标题: Apple Stops Work on Lighter Vision Pro to Fast-Track AI Smart Glasses)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果战略调整：暂停轻量版Vision Pro，加速AI智能眼镜开发

苹果公司已决定暂停开发更便宜、更轻的Vision Pro版本，转而将资源集中于智能眼镜项目。此举旨在加速智能眼镜的研发，以更好地与Meta等竞争对手抗衡。

### Vision Pro项目调整
*   **“Vision Air”项目暂停**：此前有传闻称苹果正在开发一款更轻、更实惠的“Vision Air”，原计划于2027年发布，但该项目现已暂停。
*   **工程师转移**：原负责“Vision Air”项目的工程师已被调往智能眼镜项目。
*   **现有Vision Pro更新**：尽管轻量版Vision Pro的开发暂停，但现有Vision Pro型号仍计划在今年晚些时候更新M5芯片。

### 苹果智能眼镜详情
*   **竞争目标**：苹果的智能眼镜将直接对标Meta的AI智能Ray-Ban眼镜。
*   **核心功能**：预计将配备摄像头、麦克风和AI功能。
*   **发布时间线**：
    *   最快可能在明年首次亮相。
    *   预计将于2027年正式上市。
*   **版本规划**：
    *   **首个版本**：将不包含显示屏。
    *   **后续版本**：苹果正在开发带有集成显示屏的型号，原计划2028年推出，但由于Meta的竞争，目前正加速开发。
*   **AI与Siri**：
    *   智能眼镜将高度依赖AI和语音指令，这需要下一代Siri的支持。
    *   Siri此前因未能达到iOS 18中Apple Intelligence的预期而延迟，但基于新架构的更新版Siri预计将于2026年春季发布。
*   **设计与连接**：
    *   苹果计划将智能眼镜打造成时尚配饰，提供多种材质和镜框选择，用户可自定义颜色和款式。
    *   内置苹果自研芯片，但仍需连接iPhone使用。
    *   其他功能可能包括健康追踪。

![Apple Galsses Feature Redux 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/m_y5ZCdUD_BA-kyBItZ9AzXiFDY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Galsses-Feature-Redux-2.5.jpg?lossy)

### Meta的竞争态势
*   **Meta Ray-Ban Display AI眼镜**：Meta已推出多款Meta Ray-Bans，并拥有比苹果目前更先进的AI产品。其Ray-Ban Display AI眼镜在其中一个镜片中集成了全彩、高分辨率显示屏。
*   **功能**：该显示屏能够显示消息、照片和来自Meta AI的信息。
*   **外观与未来**：Meta的眼镜外观与普通眼镜相似，是其“Orion”增强现实眼镜（去年发布，具有双AR显示屏的厚重眼镜）的第一步。

![meta ai glasses](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kLIauGbG6_bSCwS8AoS6MmivlBc=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/meta-ai-glasses.jpg?lossy)

苹果和Meta都致力于在未来推出轻量级增强现实眼镜。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已暂停开发更轻、更便宜的Vision Pro版本，转而集中资源加速AI智能眼镜的研发，以应对Meta的竞争。这款智能眼镜将配备摄像头、麦克风和AI功能，预计最快明年亮相，2027年上市。首版不含显示屏，后续将推出带显示屏版本。它将依赖下一代Siri和连接的iPhone。Meta已推出带显示屏的AI眼镜，并在AI技术上领先。
items.translated_title: 苹果暂停开发轻量版Vision Pro，加速AI智能眼镜项目
items.content:
Apple has decided to stop work on a cheaper, lighter version of the $3,499 Vision Pro to instead focus its resources on smart glasses, reports Bloomberg. Apple wants to speed up development on a glasses product to better compete with Meta.


There were rumors that Apple was developing a a much lighter, more affordable "Vision Air" for launch in 2027, but Apple is now transitioning engineers from that project to its smart glasses project.

Apple is working on a set of smart glasses that will rival Meta's AI-equipped Ray-Bans. The glasses will include cameras, microphones, and AI capabilities. Apple could introduce the glasses as soon as next year, and then launch them in 2027.

There won't be a display in the first version of the glasses, but Apple is developing another model that will include an integrated display. Apple wanted to debut the version with a display in 2028, but it is now aiming to speed up development because Meta just recently announced the Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses.

The Meta-Ray Ban Display glasses include a full-color, high-resolution display in one of the lenses. The display is able to display messages, photos, and information from Meta AI. Meta's glasses look similar to regular glasses despite the added screen, and they are the first step toward Meta's "Orion" augmented reality glasses. Meta unveiled its AR glasses last year, showing off thick pair of glasses with dual AR displays. Both Apple and Meta are aiming to launch lightweight augmented reality glasses in the future.

Meta's Ray-Ban Display

Meta has come out with several variations of the Meta Ray-Bans since 2023, and the company has a more advanced AI product than Apple does. Apple's smart glasses will rely on AI and voice-based commands, which will require the next-generation version of Siri.

Apple delayed ‌Siri‌ after the assistant didn't meet expectations for promised Apple Intelligence features in iOS 18, but an updated version of ‌Siri‌ built on new architecture is expected in spring 2026.

Apple plans to release its first smart glasses with multiple material and frame options, turning them into a fashion accessory. Buyers will be able to choose their preferred color and frame style. The glasses will have an Apple-designed chip inside, but will still be reliant on a connected iPhone. Other features will include cameras, microphones, and health tracking capabilities.

While work on a lighter version of the Vision Pro has been paused for now, Apple still plans to refresh the current model with an M5 chip later this year.
Tags: Apple Glasses, Bloomberg

items.title: 谷歌发布100美元家用智能音箱，设计类似HomePod mini，并集成Gemini AI (原标题: Google Announces $100 Home Speaker With HomePod Mini-Like Design and Gemini AI)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 谷歌发布新款家用智能音箱：融合HomePod mini设计与Gemini AI

谷歌于2025年10月1日发布了其新款Google Home Speaker，该产品在设计上借鉴了HomePod mini的风格，并深度集成了谷歌的Gemini AI。

## 设计与定价
*   **外观设计**：新款音箱采用矮胖圆润的造型，外部覆盖3D针织面料，底部设有一个彩色光环，用于指示音箱的监听状态。其设计灵感来源于HomePod mini，但并非完全圆形。
*   **颜色选择**：提供翡翠绿（Jade）、浆果红（Berry）、瓷白色（Porcelain）和榛子色（Hazel）四种颜色。
*   **定价**：售价为100美元，与苹果HomePod mini的99美元定价相近。

## 音频特性
*   **音质**：谷歌表示该音箱能提供更丰富、360度的环绕音效和平衡的声学效果。
*   **多音箱配对**：支持将多个音箱配对使用，以实现更广阔的音场或多房间音频。

## Gemini AI集成
*   **核心驱动**：新款音箱的核心是Google的Gemini AI，并集成了Gemini for Home。
*   **自然语音对话**：支持自然语音AI对话，具备会话上下文理解能力。
*   **广泛的AI功能**：用户可以就烹饪、旅行、规划、探索想法、学习、管理日历、学习语言、获取建议、学习技能、播放音乐等多种主题进行提问和互动。

## 隐私保护
*   **物理麦克风开关**：音箱配备了一个物理开关，用户可以手动关闭麦克风，以确保隐私，防止音箱监听对话。

## Google Home Premium 服务
*   **服务概述**：Google Home Premium是新款音箱的关键组成部分，旨在与音箱、摄像头、显示器等多种设备集成，提供AI监督和基于对话的自动化功能。
*   **智能家居联动**：
    *   与连接的摄像头配合，Google Home Premium可以分析录像，告知用户离家期间发生的事情。
    *   提供智能警报功能，可检测包裹、人物、门是否未关以及烟雾警报。
*   **取代Nest Aware**：该服务将取代现有的Nest Aware。
*   **定价方案**：
    *   **标准版**：每月10美元或每年100美元，包含Gemini Live（语音聊天功能）和家庭自动化功能。
    *   **高级版**：每月20美元或每年200美元，包含每日摘要和视频历史搜索选项。
    *   该服务也包含在Google AI Pro和Google AI Ultra订阅中。
*   **Gemini for Home与Premium的区别**：
    *   Gemini for Home（用于基本问答）对Google Home Speaker用户免费。
    *   Gemini Live、AI自动化、声音检测、AI驱动通知、Home Brief、视频历史搜索和每日简报等高级功能需要订阅Google Home Premium。

## 上市时间与相关产品
*   **上市时间**：新款Google Home Speaker预计于2026年春季上市。
*   **相关新品**：谷歌还同时发布了新款Nest Cam Indoor、Nest Cam Outdoor和Nest Doorbell摄像头，这些摄像头支持2K HDR视频、改进的低光性能，并可与Google Home Premium服务集成。

![google smart speaker](https://images.macrumors.com/t/POI6xNENslflgrneCDsxu7QApRA=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/google-smart-speaker.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 谷歌发布了一款售价100美元的新款家用智能音箱，设计类似HomePod mini。该音箱集成Gemini AI，提供丰富的360度音效、自然语音AI对话和智能家居自动化功能。它配备了物理麦克风开关以保护隐私。此外，谷歌还推出了Google Home Premium服务，以增强AI功能并与摄像头等设备深度集成。该音箱预计于2026年春季上市。
items.translated_title: 谷歌发布100美元家用智能音箱，设计类似HomePod mini，并集成Gemini AI
items.content:
Google today announced the launch of a new Google Home Speaker, which has a more HomePod mini-like design than prior versions of the smart speaker.


Priced at $100, the speaker has a squat, rounded shape with a 3D knit fabric covering and a colorful light ring at the bottom so you know when the speaker is listening. It comes in Jade, Berry, Porcelain, and Hazel. Google says the speaker offers richer, 360-degree sound, balanced acoustics, and the ability to pair multiple speakers together.

The speaker's design is reminiscent of the HomePod mini, but it isn't quite as round. Google is targeting the same price point, as Apple sells the ‌HomePod mini‌ for $99. It's been some time since Apple upgraded the ‌HomePod mini‌, but we could get a refresh as soon as this year.

The new Google Home Speaker integrates with Gemini for Home and a new Google Home Premium service that's powered by Google's Gemini AI. Natural voice chat is supported for AI conversations, and all the AI features you might expect are available like conversational context. You can ask questions about cooking, trips, planning, explore ideas, study, manage calendars, learn languages, get advice, learn skills, play music, and more.


Google added a physical toggle to turn off the microphone for a privacy mode that ensures the speaker isn't listening to conversations.

The Google Home Premium service is a key part of the updated Google Home Speaker, and it is meant to integrate with speakers, cameras, displays, and more, providing AI oversight and simple, conversation-based automation. If you have connected cameras, Google Home Premium can analyze footage and let you know what happens when you're away, plus it powers smart alerts for detecting packages, people, doors left open, and smoke alarms. Google's Gemini AI integration gives its speaker capabilities that the ‌HomePod‌ and the ‌HomePod mini‌ currently lack.

Google's new speaker is set to come out in spring 2026, and it will be priced at $100. Google Home Premium Standard is priced at $10 per month or $100 per year for Gemini Live and home automation features, while Google Home Premium Advanced is priced at $20 per month or $200 per year for daily summaries and video history search options. Access is also included in Google AI Pro and Google AI Ultra.

Google Home Premium replaces Nest Aware. Google Home Speaker owners can ask Gemini questions at no cost because Gemini for Home is included, but Gemini Live (the voice-based chat feature), AI automations, sound detection, AI-powered notifications, Home Brief, video history search, and daily briefings require Google Home Premium.

Google also debuted new Nest Cam Indoor, Nest Cam Outdoor, and Nest Doorbell cameras with 2K HDR video, improved low-light performance, and Google Home Premium integration.
Tag: Google

items.title: T-Mobile卫星服务现已支持常用应用 (原标题: T-Mobile's Satellite Service Now Works With Popular Apps)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# T-Mobile扩展卫星服务，支持更多常用应用

T-Mobile正在扩展其与Starlink合作的“T-Satellite”服务，为多款常用应用增加卫星数据连接功能。这意味着T-Mobile用户在没有Wi-Fi或蜂窝网络连接时，将能够通过Starlink卫星连接访问这些受支持的应用。

![tmobile starlink](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vjLQMxasXC46-Be-Ea-vOaXFP3Y=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/tmobile-starlink.jpg?lossy)

## 主要更新与功能

### 1. 新增支持的常用应用

通过T-Mobile卫星连接可使用的应用包括：
*   Google Maps
*   AllTrails
*   AccuWeather
*   CalTopo
*   X (原Twitter)
*   WhatsApp (支持文本、语音和视频聊天)
*   onX
*   T-Life

### 2. 此前已支持的本地应用

一些设备原生应用，如Google Messages、Find Hub、Pixel Weather、Apple Music、Apple Weather和Apple Fitness，此前已可通过T-Mobile的美国卫星服务使用。

### 3. 服务工作原理

*   当蜂窝或Wi-Fi连接不可用时，T-Satellite服务将自动启用卫星连接。
*   应用将提供定制化的关键内容，而非完整的数据密集型体验，以适应卫星连接的特性。

### 4. 设备兼容性

*   T-Satellite服务支持Apple iPhone。
*   它可以与iPhone 14及更高版本中内置的卫星连接功能协同使用。

### 5. 资费方案

*   **T-Mobile现有用户：**
    *   服务已包含在T-Mobile的Experience Beyond和Go5G Next套餐中。
    *   其他T-Mobile套餐的用户可以每月10美元的价格获得访问权限。
*   **非T-Mobile智能手机用户：**
    *   可以每月10美元的价格订阅T-Satellite作为独立服务。
items.shortSummary: T-Mobile的T-Satellite与Starlink服务现已扩展，支持Google Maps、WhatsApp等多种常用应用。用户在没有Wi-Fi或蜂窝连接时，可通过卫星连接访问这些应用，获取定制化的关键信息。该服务兼容Apple iPhone，并可与iPhone 14及更高版本内置的卫星功能协同。T-Mobile用户可根据套餐享受或每月支付10美元，非T-Mobile用户也可每月10美元订阅独立服务。
items.translated_title: T-Mobile卫星服务现已支持常用应用
items.content:
T-Mobile is expanding its T-Satellite with Starlink service, adding satellite data connectivity to multiple popular apps. That means T-Mobile users who don't have a Wi-Fi or cellular connection will be able to use Starlink satellite connectivity to access supported apps.


Apps that will work over a T-Mobile satellite connection include Google Maps, AllTrails, AccuWeather, CalTopo, X, WhatsApp (texts, voice, and video chat), onX, and T-Life.

Some native device apps like Google Messages, Find Hub, Pixel Weather, Apple Music, Apple Weather, and Apple Fitness were already able to be used with T-Mobile's U.S. satellite service.

T-Mobile subscribers with access to T-Satellite will see the satellite connection kick in whenever cellular or Wi-Fi connectivity are unavailable. Apps will offer tailored, critical content instead of full data-heavy experiences.

T-Satellite works on Apple's iPhones, and it can be used alongside the native satellite connectivity available in the iPhone 14 and later. The satellite service is included in T-Mobile's Experience Beyond and Go5G Next plans, and T-Mobile customers with other plans can get access for $10 per month. Smartphone users who do not have T-Mobile can subscribe to T-Satellite as a standalone service for $10 per month.

items.title: 你的Meta AI聊天将很快影响你看到的广告 (原标题: Your Meta AI Chats Will Soon Influence the Ads You See)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## Meta AI聊天将用于广告个性化

Meta公司宣布，计划从2025年12月16日起，利用用户在Facebook、Instagram、WhatsApp和Messenger等平台与Meta AI进行的生成式AI对话来个性化内容和定制广告推荐。

![meta ai](https://images.macrumors.com/t/8tYPGuHtIiyETKKlkak7qPKS5BE=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/meta-ai.jpg?lossy)

### 关键信息点：

*   **数据来源与用途**：
    *   与Meta AI进行的文本和语音对话将被用于个性化帖子、Reels、广告等内容。
    *   Meta表示，此举旨在改善推荐系统，让用户“更有可能看到他们真正感兴趣的内容”，并将其比作基于用户在Facebook和Instagram上互动内容进行推荐的方式。
    *   例如，如果用户与AI讨论徒步旅行，Meta可能会展示徒步鞋的广告。

*   **用户选择与控制**：
    *   **无法选择退出**：用户无法直接选择退出Meta基于AI的广告定位。
    *   **有限的调整**：用户可以通过“广告偏好”和动态消息控制来限制特定主题的广告或逐个屏蔽广告商，但无法阻止Meta访问其AI对话数据。
    *   **唯一避免方式**：防止Meta将AI对话用于内容和广告定位的唯一方法是根本不使用Meta AI。

*   **数据使用范围与限制**：
    *   **跨产品使用**：与Meta AI的互动数据将在同一“账户中心”关联的所有Meta产品中共享和使用。
    *   **敏感话题排除**：Meta声明，性取向、政治观点、健康、种族或民族出身、哲学信仰或工会成员身份等敏感话题不会用于广告定位。
    *   **生效日期**：2025年12月16日之前的对话不会被用于个性化。个性化功能将从该日期开始启用。
    *   **用户通知**：在此功能生效前，用户将收到产品内通知和电子邮件。
    *   **地理限制**：目前，欧盟、英国和韩国的用户暂时不受此数据使用政策的影响，但在全球大多数国家和地区都将实施。

此举代表了Meta在利用AI数据进行广告和内容个性化方面迈出的重要一步，旨在提升用户体验，但也引发了对用户隐私和数据控制的关注。
items.shortSummary: Meta公司宣布，将从2025年12月16日起，利用用户在Facebook、Instagram、WhatsApp和Messenger等平台与Meta AI的文本和语音聊天内容，来个性化广告和内容推荐。用户无法选择退出此AI驱动的广告定位，唯一避免方式是不使用Meta AI。敏感话题不会用于广告定位，且欧盟、英国和韩国暂时不受影响。此举旨在改善用户体验，但引发了隐私担忧。
items.translated_title: 你的Meta AI聊天将很快影响你看到的广告
items.content:
If you've been using Meta AI in Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, or Messenger, you might want to stop. Starting later this year, Meta plans to use your generative AI conversations to personalize content and tailor ad recommendations.


Text exchanges and voice conversations with Meta AI will be used to personalize posts, reels, ads, and more. Meta says that incorporating AI conversations will help the company improve its recommendations so that people are "more likely to see content they're actually interested in."

Meta likens using AI conversations to tailoring recommendations based on the content that people interact with on Facebook and Instagram. If you converse with AI about hiking, for example, Meta will show ads for hiking boots, as it would if you liked a hiking-related page.

There is no way to opt out of Meta's AI-based ad targeting, but Meta claims that users can adjust the content and ads they're seeing with Ad Preferences and feed controls. With Ad Preferences, you can limit ads from specific topics or block advertisers one by one, but you can't choose not to let Meta access your AI conversations. Interactions with Meta AI are used across Meta products that have been added to the same Accounts Center.

With no opt-out feature, the only way to prevent Meta from using your AI conversations for content and ad targeting purposes is not to use the AI in the first place.

Meta says that sensitive topics like sexual orientation, political views, health, racial or ethnic origin, philosophical beliefs, or trade union membership are not used for ad targeting purposes. Conversations that take place before December 16 won't be used.

Meta plans to start using AI for personalization on December 16, 2025, and customers will receive in-product notifications and emails before it happens. Data will be used for personalization in most countries around the world, though not in the EU, UK, and South Korea for the time being.
Tags: Facebook, Instagram, Meta

items.title: 罗技发布MX Master 4后，苹果Magic Mouse 3有何期待 (原标题: What to Expect From Apple's Magic Mouse 3 After Logitech Announces MX Master 4)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 罗技MX Master 4发布及其对苹果Magic Mouse 3的影响

罗技于2025年10月1日宣布推出其广受欢迎的Mac和PC鼠标MX Master 4的最新版本。这款新鼠标带来了多项改进，包括：

*   **触觉反馈**：针对特定操作提供触觉反馈。
*   **全新操作环**：光标旁新增“操作环”，可快速访问屏幕快捷方式。
*   **更坚硬的塑料表面**：不易沾染污渍，提升耐用性。
*   **定价与上市**：在美国，MX Master 4 for Mac售价为119.99美元，本月开始发货。

![Magic Mouse Green](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BhQ1lQcnBWZcyChweEDTv3SfZGI=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/Magic-Mouse-Green.jpg?lossy)

### 苹果Magic Mouse 3的预期与传闻

鉴于MX Master系列已更新，人们自然会关注苹果何时会发布新的Magic Mouse。根据目前的传闻，所谓的Magic Mouse 3最早有望在2026年发布，主要有两大改进：

1.  **充电端口位置调整**：
    *   **现状问题**：尽管Magic Mouse去年已从Lightning接口改为USB-C，但充电端口仍位于鼠标底部，导致充电时无法使用。
    *   **未来改进**：彭博社的Mark Gurman在2024年12月透露，苹果正在开发一款重新设计的Magic Mouse，其充电端口将重新定位，解决这一不便。
2.  **更符合人体工程学的设计**：
    *   **舒适度提升**：Gurman还表示，下一代Magic Mouse将更符合人体工程学，使用起来更舒适。
    *   **设计灵感**：虽然没有具体的细节，但苹果可能会借鉴Mac流行替代品（如MX Master系列）的设计，例如加入拇指托、前置USB-C充电端口、精确追踪和双滚轮等。
    *   **历史回顾**：Magic Mouse的整体外观自2009年以来变化不大。多年来的显著变化包括：2015年从AA电池改为内置充电电池，2021年推出与iMac配套的颜色选项，以及去年从Lightning改为USB-C。在过去十年中，Magic Mouse并未获得苹果太多关注。

### Magic Mouse与MX Master 4的对比

*   **Magic Mouse优势**：主要卖点是多点触控手势支持，例如在网页间滑动、文档滚动和缩放。
*   **MX Master 4优势**：
    *   提供触觉反馈，而现有Magic Mouse缺乏此功能。
    *   对于高级用户而言，MX Master 4是一款更复杂的鼠标，提供多个可编程按钮和超高速滚动选项。
*   **竞争展望**：Magic Mouse 3传闻中的充电端口重新定位和更符合人体工程学的设计，将有助于其更好地与MX Master 3和MX Master 4竞争。然而，罗技的鼠标在功能上可能仍将保持领先地位。

### 发布时间与定价

*   **发布时间**：根据Gurman去年的报告，新的Magic Mouse最早将于2026年发布。但Gurman已数月未对此鼠标发表评论。
*   **当前定价**：目前Magic Mouse在美国单独售价为79美元，购买iMac或Mac Pro时可免费获得。
*   **Magic Mouse 3定价**：目前尚无关于Magic Mouse 3价格的消息。
items.shortSummary: 罗技发布了带有触觉反馈和新功能的MX Master 4鼠标。苹果Magic Mouse 3最早预计2026年发布，传闻将重新定位充电端口并采用更符合人体工程学的设计。现有Magic Mouse以多点触控为特色，但功能不如MX Master 4先进。Magic Mouse 3的改进旨在提升竞争力，但罗技鼠标可能仍将保持技术领先。
items.translated_title: 罗技发布MX Master 4后，苹果Magic Mouse 3有何期待
items.content:
Logitech this week announced the MX Master 4, the latest version of its popular mouse for Macs and PCs. The new model offers haptic feedback for certain actions, includes a new Actions Ring for quick access to on-screen shortcuts next to the cursor, has a harder plastic finish that is less prone to stains, and more. In the U.S., the MX Master 4 for Mac is priced at $119.99, with shipments beginning this month.


Given the MX Master has now received an update, you may be wondering when Apple plans to release a new Magic Mouse. Below, we outline rumors about the so-called Magic Mouse 3, which is expected to be released in 2026 at the earliest.

The two key rumors for the Magic Mouse 3 so far include a relocated charging port, along with a more ergonomic design.

Rumored Features


Relocated Charging Port


While the Magic Mouse switched from Lightning to USB-C last year, the charging port is still located on the bottom of the mouse, which prevents it from being used while charging. This is only a minor inconvenience, as charging the mouse is a quick and infrequent process, but it sounds like Apple will finally relocate the port.

In December 2024, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said Apple was working on a redesigned Magic Mouse with a relocated charging port.

More Ergonomic Design


In addition to having a relocated charging port, Gurman said the next Magic Mouse would be more ergonomic and comfortable to use.

While no specific design details about the next Magic Mouse were shared, perhaps Apple will take some inspiration from popular alternatives for the Mac, like the MX Master series. That mouse features an ergonomic design with a thumb rest, a front-facing USB-C charging port, precision tracking, two scroll wheels, and more.

The overall look of the Magic Mouse has not changed much since 2009, so a redesign has been a long time coming. Notable changes over the years include the mouse switching from AA batteries to a built-in rechargeable battery in 2015, new color-matching options with the iMac in 2021, and the switch from Lightning to USB-C last year. Overall, the Magic Mouse has not received much attention from Apple over the past decade.

Magic Mouse vs. MX Master 4


A key selling point of the Magic Mouse is multi-touch gesture support, for actions such as swiping between web pages, scrolling through documents, and zooming. However, unlike the MX Master 4, the existing Magic Mouse lacks haptic feedback.

Overall, the MX Master 4 is a far more sophisticated mouse than the Magic Mouse for power users, as it offers multiple programmable buttons, an option for ultra-fast scrolling, and more. With haptic feedback, the MX Master 4 gets even better.

Fortunately, the rumors about the Magic Mouse 3 featuring a relocated USB-C charging port and a more ergonomic design should help it to better compete with the MX Master 3 and MX Master 4, but Logitech's mouse will likely remain more advanced.

Release Timing and Pricing


The new Magic Mouse will be released in 2026 at the earliest, according to Gurman's report last year. However, he has not commented on the mouse in many months.

The current Magic Mouse is priced at $79 in the U.S., on a standalone basis, and it is included at no additional cost with the purchase of an iMac or a Mac Pro.

There is no word yet on how much the Magic Mouse 3 will cost.
Tag: Magic Mouse
